changeSet.author: shurapilipuk@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: Test data for kitchen order items
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO kitchens.kitchen_order_items (kitchen_order_id, item_name, is_cooked, active, created_at) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 101), 'Beef Steak', false, true, now()), ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 101), 'Red Wine', true, true, now()), ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 102), 'Mushroom Pizza', false, true, now()), ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 102), 'Garlic Sauce', true, true, now()), ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 103), 'Caesar Salad', false, true, now()), ((SELECT id FROM kitchens.kitchen_orders WHERE order_id = 105), 'Tomato Soup', true, true, now());
